Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • Animal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bear, Boar, Cow, Elephant, Fox, Hippopotamus, Lion, Rabbit, Tiger, Turtle, Vulture, Wolf

    public abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates animal behaviours. It is used to define special animal types. It is meaningless if we make an object of this class so it is abstart

      • Animal

        public Animal(int attackPrimary,
              int attackSecondary,
              int HP,
              int SP,
              java.lang.String attack1,
              java.lang.String attack2)
        Parameters:
        attackPrimary - first attack damage
        attackSecondary - Second attack damage
        HP - Health points
        SP - Stamina points
        attack1 - first attack name
        attack2 - second attack name

    • Method Detail

      • loseSP

        public void loseSP(int stamina)
        Calculates animal's SP after a successful attack
        Parameters:
        stamina - the amount of stamina is used for successful attack

      • loseHP

        public void loseHP(int health)
        Calculates animal's HP after being attacked
        Parameters:
        health - amount of health the animal under attack has lost

      • restoreSP

        public void restoreSP()
        Restores full SP to an animal

      • checkSPforAttack

        public boolean checkSPforAttack(int attackDamage)
        Parameters:
        attackDamage - amount of damage animal wants to deal in an attack
        Returns:
        true: Animal has enough SP to attack | false: animal doesn't have enough SP to attack
